markdown: ###### Moderate Positive reputation with VTC;[Lance of the Midwood Stag](/lanceOfTheMidwoodStag/) | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = | conc = | next = Bounty - Veen | internalname = BOUNTY_TSK_VTC_01 | guid = e9f88ae7-1f1b-497a-8130-7695c0ae06b0 }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [bounty](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsBounties/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis Aenia has tasked the Watcher with hunting down [Biakara](/biakara/), a Huana captain at the helm of the voyager ''[The Scale of Tangaloa](/theScaleOfTangaloa/)''. There's a bounty to claim in exchange for evidence of the captain's death. ## Walkthrough * Biakara sails ''The Scale of Tangaloa'' off the northeastern coast of [Hasongo](/hasongo/). She's a lightly armed vessel that should pose no problem to sink. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/Bounties/BOUNTY_TSK_VTC_01.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Bounty - Biakara''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Aenia has tasked me with hunting down Biakara, a Huana captain at the helm of the voyager Scale of Tangaloa. There's a bounty to claim in exchange for evidence of the captain's death. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Kill Biakara and take her ship's triumph.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Biakara sails Scale of Tangaloa off the northeastern coast of Hasongo. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Aenia.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Biakara's bounty is mine to claim. I can return to Aenia outside of the Vailian Trading Company headquarters at Queen's Berth in Neketaka to collect my reward. |- ! colspan="3" | Unused strings |- | rowspan="1" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''-''' | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 30001 | |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I dealt with Biakara and claimed the reward for her bounty. |}
